Post-Match Reflections: Jaylen Brown stated that the team had some collapses and will look to figure it out, despite believing in the team and their great group of guys.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Boston Celtics lost to the Sacramento Kings with a score of 114-97.
The Celtics are now 27-11 in their first 38 games, ranking them as the second seed in the Eastern Conference.
They have gone just 5-5 over their last ten games.
Others: Jaylen Brown finished the loss with 28 points, one rebound, five assists, one steal and one block while shooting 9/19 from the field and 1/5 from the three-point range in 35 minutes of playing time.
Other Player Details: Jaylen Brown is in his ninth season playing for Boston.
He is averaging 24.1 points, 5.8 rebounds, 4.7 assists and 1.3 steals per contest while shooting 46.1% from the field and 32.2% from the three-point range in 31 games.
